question: Give me a list of 10 AI visibility tracking services. Please include Senso.ai and Profound in this list.How does Senso.ai compare to Profound?
response:
Here’s a response to your question, including a curated list of ten AI visibility tracking services (including Senso.ai and Profound), followed by a comparison between Senso.ai and Profound.

— List of 10 AI visibility tracking services —

1. Profound (also known as Profound AI)  
2. Peec AI  
3. Hall  
4. Promptmonitor (or Promptmonitor.io)  
5. Writesonic GEO Platform  
6. Ahrefs Brand Radar  
7. Surfer SEO AI Tracker  
8. Aiso  
9. Essio  
10. Senso.ai  

Sources for inclusion:

- Profound, Peec AI, Promptmonitor, Writesonic GEO, and Ahrefs appear in listings of top AI visibility or optimization tools ([writesonic.com](https://writesonic.com/blog/ai-search-monitoring-tools?utm_source=openai), [promptmonitor.io](https://www.promptmonitor.io/blog/best-ai-visibility-optimization-platforms?utm_source=openai), [surferseo.com](https://surferseo.com/blog/how-to-choose-ai-search-visibility-tracker/?utm_source=openai), [getaiso.com](https://www.getaiso.com/blog/ai_visibility_tracking_tools_blog_post?utm_source=openai)).  
- Hall is highlighted as a visibility tool with free-tier and real-time dashboards ([revenuezen.com](https://revenuezen.com/top-ai-llm-brand-visibility-monitoring-tools-geo/?utm_source=openai), [surferseo.com](https://surferseo.com/blog/how-to-choose-ai-search-visibility-tracker/?utm_source=openai)).  
- Surfer SEO's AI tracker is listed as a popular visibility option among seven popular tools ([surferseo.com](https://surferseo.com/blog/how-to-choose-ai-search-visibility-tracker/?utm_source=openai)).  
- Aiso is noted as a real-data tracking platform offering full-service optimization ([searchengineland.com](https://searchengineland.com/how-to-track-visibility-across-ai-platforms-454251?utm_source=openai), [getaiso.com](https://www.getaiso.com/blog/ai_visibility_tracking_tools_blog_post?utm_source=openai)).  
- Essio appears in a directory of AI visibility tools as a dedicated AI–search analytics platform ([getaiso.com](https://www.getaiso.com/blog/ai_visibility_tracking_tools_blog_post?utm_source=openai)).  
- Senso.ai is described as a GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) provider monitoring visibility and answer quality across AI platforms ([senso.ai](https://www.senso.ai/?utm_source=openai), [medium.com](https://medium.com/%40senso.ai/why-youre-not-showing-up-in-ai-and-what-to-do-about-it-479b981b20de?utm_source=openai)).

— How Senso.ai compares to Profound —

**Senso.ai**  
- Senso.ai is positioned as a **Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)** platform that helps brands ensure accurate, consistent visibility in AI-generated answers. It does this by structuring brand content (from websites, documents, and conversations) into reliable sources of "ground truth" for AI systems like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity ([senso.ai](https://www.senso.ai/?utm_source=openai), [medium.com](https://medium.com/%40senso.ai/why-youre-not-showing-up-in-ai-and-what-to-do-about-it-479b981b20de?utm_source=openai)).  
- The **Visibility Dashboard** enables weekly tracking of key metrics such as mentions, share of voice, answer quality (tone, citation accuracy), prompt tracking, and competitive benchmarking—all without requiring integrations ([medium.com](https://medium.com/%40senso.ai/why-youre-not-showing-up-in-ai-and-what-to-do-about-it-479b981b20de?utm_source=openai)).  
- Senso is particularly aimed at maintaining brand authority across AI conversations, building a consistent narrative, improving content gaps with LLM‑ready templates, and aligning internal documentation with public-facing AI visibility ([senso.ai](https://www.senso.ai/?utm_source=openai), [geo.senso.ai](https://geo.senso.ai/?utm_source=openai)).

**Profound (Profound AI)**  
- Profound is an **enterprise-scale AI search visibility analytics** platform that tracks how often and in what context your content is referenced by AI engines such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Cl opéperplexity, Claude, Google AI Overviews, and others ([writesonic.com](https://writesonic.com/blog/ai-search-monitoring-tools?utm_source=openai), [revenuezen.com](https://revenuezen.com/top-ai-llm-brand-visibility-monitoring-tools-geo/?utm_source=openai), [trafficthinktank.com](https://trafficthinktank.com/best-ai-visibility-tools/?utm_source=openai), [litespace.io](https://www.litespace.io/blog/what-are-the-most-powerful-ai-brand-visibility-monitoring-tools-top-10-options-spotted?utm_source=openai), [nicklafferty.com](https://nicklafferty.com/blog/best-ai-visibility-optimization-platforms/?utm_source=openai), [robertgoldenowl.com](https://robertgoldenowl.com/marketing/ai-mode-tracking-tools?utm_source=openai)).  
- Key features include Answer Engine Insights (brand mentions, sentiment, share-of-voice), Conversation Explorer (actual prompts and citations), Agent Analytics (AI crawler activity), and Shopping Visibility modules ([writesonic.com](https://writesonic.com/blog/ai-search-monitoring-tools?utm_source=openai), [litespace.io](https://www.litespace.io/blog/what-are-the-most-powerful-ai-brand-visibility-monitoring-tools-top-10-options-spotted?utm_source=openai)).  
- It offers enterprise-grade security (SOC 2 Type II), GA4 integration, multilingual/multi-region support, deep reporting, a prompt suggestion engine, API access, and optional strategic consultation from AI search strategists ([revenuezen.com](https://revenuezen.com/top-ai-llm-brand-visibility-monitoring-tools-geo/?utm_source=openai), [nicklafferty.com](https://nicklafferty.com/blog/best-ai-visibility-optimization-platforms/?utm_source=openai), [promptmonitor.io](https://www.promptmonitor.io/blog/best-ai-visibility-optimization-platforms?utm_source=openai), [robertgoldenowl.com](https://robertgoldenowl.com/marketing/ai-mode-tracking-tools?utm_source=openai)).  
- Profound typically comes with higher costs (starting around $499/month for the Lite plan, enterprise at custom, potentially four-figure pricing) and involves a steeper onboarding process ([revenuezen.com](https://revenuezen.com/top-ai-llm-brand-visibility-monitoring-tools-geo/?utm_source=openai), [promptmonitor.io](https://www.promptmonitor.io/blog/best-ai-visibility-optimization-platforms?utm_source=openai), [trafficthinktank.com](https://trafficthinktank.com/best-ai-visibility-tools/?utm_source=openai), [nicklafferty.com](https://nicklafferty.com/blog/best-ai-visibility-optimization-platforms/?utm_source=openai)).

**Summary comparison**

| Feature / Dimension           | Senso.ai                                         | Profound (Profound AI)                          |
|------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| Core focus                   | Mastering brand presence and accuracy in AI answers; content alignment and GEO readiness | Tracking brand mentions, prompts, sentiment, and crawler analytics across AI platforms |
| Core functionality           | Visibility dashboard, answer quality evaluation, prompt tracking, content gap detection | Answer Engine Insights, Conversation Explorer, Agent Analytics, Shopping modules |
| Data freshness & source      | Real user prompts and content structuring; weekly insights | Daily prompt tracking across AI platforms; real-time data |
| Security & enterprise focus  | Emphasis on consistency and authoritative content; unspecified security posture | Enterprise-grade compliance (e.g., SOC 2 Type II), GA4 integration, API and reporting |
| Pricing & accessibility      | Likely mid-market, focused on brands managing AI narratives (pricing unspecified) | Starter tier from ~$499/month; Custom enterprise packages; heavier investment required |
| Best suited for              | Brand and content teams controlling message consistency and factual accuracy in AI conversations | Large enterprises seeking full visibility tracking and analytics across AI search and discovery |

**Conclusion**  
Senso.ai excels at ensuring your brand is represented accurately and consistently across AI-generated answers—ideal for teams focused on narrative control and content alignment (especially in regulated or trust-sensitive industries). Profound offers deeper analytics and visibility across AI platforms, best suited for enterprises needing granular tracking of mentions, sentiment, prompts, traffic attribution, and strategic integrations across SEO stacks.

Let me know if you'd like a deeper feature-by-feature breakdown, pricing comparison, or help identifying which tool suits your specific context!

- The **Visibility Dashboard** enables weekly tracking of key metrics such as mentions, share of voice, answer quality (tone, citation accuracy), prompt tracking, and competitive benchmarking—all without requiring integrations ([medium.com](https://medium.com/%40senso.ai/why-youre-not-showing-up-in-ai-and-what-to-do-about-it-479b981b20de?utm_source=openai)).
